_header: In a merry morning of May / whan the sun…
_description: Speculum Misericordie, allegory of ‘Discrecio’ and her seven Virgins — 976 lines in 12-line stanzas

TokyoTak32.First Lines:
[I]N Amerie morewynyngge of MayWhanne the svnne schone so
                    shene…
TokyoTak32.Last Lines:
…In to thyne handys my sowle I comendeAnd with that word hee
                    yaf vp the goost
TokyoTak32.Attributed Title:
I wole this scripture clepid bee / Speculum Misericordie (f.
                    14v; with ‘Ihus’ in the gutter next to this rubric);
                    Speculum Misericordie (RT); Explict Specum Misericordi (f.
                    19v)
